txt.en: Defeat All-seeing cultists ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
A group of Barkhûshim leap out to ambush you
'We must be prepared for more resistance.'
Defeated All-seeing cultists ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Speak with Mizâdi to continue your ascent through the tower
Ascend the tower with Mizâdi to confront Okhíso
A group of Okhíso's personal guard step out, ready to do battle!
Defeated Okhíso's personal guards ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Alert Mizâdi you are prepared to continue
Listen to Mizâdi and Okhíso
Mizâdi arrives at the throne ready to treat with Okhíso
Ascend the tower with Mizâdi to confront Okhíso
You must quickly ascend the tower of Kûr Anzar. Okhíso must not escape what justice demands.
Go with Mizâdi up the tower stairs to confront Okhíso.
Listen to Okhíso's dying words
Make your way out of the tower
Speak with Mizâdi in the tower
Descend and leave the tower of Kûr Anzar
Defeat Okhíso's guards and archers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You spy Okhíso with his archers and personal guard
Defeat Okhíso
Go with Mizâdi up the tower stairs to confront Okhíso
Mizâdi stops to regroup with you
Mizâdi was driven from the field of battle
Defeat All-seeing cultists ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Come, [placeholder], let us press our advantage and bring the fight to Okhíso!'
Go with Mizâdi up the tower stairs to confront Okhíso
Defeat Okhíso's personal guards ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
A group of All-seeing cultists scramble to confront you!
'Do not falter, [placeholder]. This enemy is cunning.'
Defeat Okhíso and his guards
Defeated All-seeing cultists ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Assist Mizâdi with her confrontation with Okhíso
'We draw close to apex of the tower. Prepare yourself, [placeholder], this scorpion will sting if we allow him the opportunity.'
Mizâdi stops to regroup with you
'There will be time for talk later. We must get outside, and quickly. We must save Kûr Anzar and her people!'
Finish your ascent and enter the tower room to confront Okhiso.
Go with Mizâdi up the tower stairs to confront Okhíso.
Defeat Okhíso!
Mizâdi stops to allow you to rest
Assist Mizâdi with her confrontation with Okhíso
Mizadi was driven from the field of battle
'Our ascent will not be without conflict. Stay close and we will reach Okhíso and bring the dog low.'
'Ah, there she is. Late, as is her wont.'
Tell Mizâdi you are prepared to move forward
'Did you come begging for Eshtali's life?'
'I killed him and threw his body to the Restless Dead of Esh-kimâkhi. You will have to treat with the dead for his corpse.'
Go with Mizâdi up the tower stairs to confront Okhíso.
'Ah, then it sounds like you do not mourn your husband's passing.'
'Perhaps his death was a gift I gave you. A pity.'
'Oh, I found his body, quite a while ago. Do you think me so easily shattered, Okhíso?'
'Ah, but how can you engage with me - when this whole city burns?'
'I have been cut by far crueller men than you, and I have not yet broken.'
Defeated Okhíso's guards and archers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'I mourn my husband. Any more than that you shall not hear pass from my lips.'
'Kûr Anzar will burn this day!'
Listen to Mizâdi and Okhíso.
'Let us make haste.'
'But my heart is warmed in the knowledge that your family shall soon be mourning you.'
'You think you've beaten me. You are only a queen of this pile of ashes. You will soon join your husband as worm-food!'
'I will deal with this burning city - after I deal with the smug corpse foolishly grinning at me.'
'I had wished your death more painful, and further drawn out, but alas, I have a city to liberate.'
'We should continue.'
'We are close now.'
'We cannot falter, no matter the cost.'
Defeat Okhíso's guards and archers.
Listen to Okhíso's dying words.
'Okhíso can hide no longer. Come!'
Mizâdi was driven from the field of battle
Okhíso and Mizâdi draw their swords
Finish your ascent at the tower room to confront Okhíso
Speak with Mizâdi in the tower.
Descend and leave the tower of Kûr Anzar at its base.
Mizâdi was driven from the field of battle
'Gird yourself, [placeholder], Okhíso will now pay by my hand.'
Okhíso bellows, \qArchers! Set your arrows alight - aim for the straw bales and thatched roofs below.\q
Ascend the tower with Mizâdi to confront Okhíso
Instance: A Blade of Flame and Fury, Part 2
Go with Mizâdi up the tower stairs to confront Okhíso
